summary: Entities facing lawsuits for infringing on a certain type of patent can challenge the validity of the patent through a U.S. Patent and Trademark Office program. This can be done for a fraction of the time and money that would be spent in court. Under the program, the Patent Trial and Appeal Board decides whether patents are valid. title: U.S. Patent and Trademark Office: Observations on the Covered Business Method Patent Review Program
